projects.name: Unheard Voices - Balochi Short Stories
projects.description: A digital platform dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich cultural heritage of Balochi literature. Built to make valuable stories accessible to a wider audience while maintaining authenticity.

projects.name: Balochi Chaach
projects.description: An Android app compiling traditional Balochi riddles (Chaach) to support the preservation of oral literature in a structured digital format.

projects.name: Balochi Batal
projects.description: A mobile app that curates traditional Balochi proverbs with translations and meanings, promoting cultural heritage in the digital age.

projects.name: Word Search Generator
projects.description: A specialized puzzle generator that allows users to create customized word search puzzles effortlessly with a seamless interactive experience.

projects.name: SayadGanj Balochi Dictionary
projects.description: A comprehensive dictionary for the Balochi language, available as a cross-platform desktop application and a web-based platform.

projects.name: Labzle
projects.description: A Balochi word game inspired by Wordle, offering a fun and interactive way to engage with the Balochi language through gamification.

projects.name: Chip-8 Emulator
projects.description: A high-performance Chip-8 interpreter enabling retro gaming on modern browsers through accurate system emulation.
